no_of_t=raw_input()
no_of_t=int(no_of_t)

while(no_of_t>0):
    no_of_t-=1
    n,c=raw_input().split()
    n=int(n)
    c=int(c)
    list_of_n=raw_input().split()
    for i in range(0,n):
        list_of_n[i]=int(list_of_n[i])
    sum_can=sum(list_of_n)
    if c>=sum_can:
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")
